document_title: Primary infertility: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content:
1. Maintain a safe married life
Clean thoroughly before and after intercourse to avoid infection. Couples should have regular intercourse 2-3 times a week. You two should keep a happy and rhythmic mood when having sex to increase each other's emotions.
2. Scientific and healthy lifestyle
Couples should not use too many stimulants such as alcohol because they can easily cause erectile dysfunction and reduced libido. In addition, you should also regularly exercise your body to stay physically healthy, which helps improve sex life between husband and wife.
Supplement enough nutrients that are beneficial for health and physiology
Seafood: Many types of seafood contain zinc, which helps increase desire and endurance during sex. Especially dishes made from oysters are very good for the production of healthy "sperm".; Vegetables: Cauliflower, onion family vegetables, strawberries, blueberries... should be added to daily meals to promote hormones and ensure sperm quality.
Minimize exposure to toxic environments
Chemicals, pollution, radiation... are all causes of primary infertility for both men and women. Therefore, you should use protective gear when working in highly toxic environments and areas.
3. Regular health check-ups
Couples should have regular health check-ups so that doctors can promptly intervene when serious fertility problems arise. At the same time, you both need to make sure to follow your doctor's instructions to promote the treatment process and prevent the possibility of infertility.
Center for Urology and Nephrology, Department of Andrology - Urology of Tam Anh General Hospital System brings together a team of leading experts, Internal Medicine and Surgery, skilled and dedicated.
The Center's experts and doctors are always confident in mastering the latest techniques, early detecting and effectively treating kidney and urinary tract diseases, helping patients shorten hospital stays and limit risk of recurrence, improving quality of life.
With the leading modern machinery and equipment system in the country and the region; Operating room meets international standards; Along with a 5-star boarding area and high-class service... The Urology and Nephrology Center stands out with examination, screening and treatment services for all urinary tract diseases. From common surgeries to major high-tech surgeries.
These include laparoscopic kidney stone surgery, kidney transplant, tumor resection to preserve kidney parenchyma; Radical nephrectomy; Radical prostatectomy; total bladder resection and small bowel cystoplasty; adrenalectomy; shaping urinary tract defects... Diagnosis - medical and surgical treatment of all diseases.
To schedule an examination and treatment with leading experts at the Center for Urology and Nephrology, Department of Andrology - Urology, Tam Anh General Hospital System, you can make an appointment online through the following ways:
Call the hotline 0287 102 6789 - 093 180 6858 (HCMC) or 024 3872 3872 (Hanoi) to register for a private medical appointment with a specialist, through the customer service staff.; Register for a medical appointment with any doctor you trust at the link: https://tamanhhospital.vn/danh-cho-khach-hang/dat-lich-kham/; Send a message on Tam Anh General Hospital Fanpage or Tam Anh General Hospital Urology and Andrology Fanpage; Text message via Zalo OA of Tam Anh General Hospital.
Primary infertility is not without treatment. However, the treatment process requires determination and perseverance from both husband and wife. You two should not give up halfway because of discouragement, instead you need to follow the doctor's instructions and maintain faith in a good future.
